dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, after that cool and rainy weekend, it looks like summer warmth is finally making a comeback in both Astana and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, after that cool and rainy weekend, it looks like summer warmth is finally making a comeback in both Astana and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After a cool and rainy weekend, summer warmth is returning to Astana and Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and according to Tengrinews.kz, today, May 20th, is gonna be partly cloudy with no rain, which is uh, pretty nice after all that gloom.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and according to the website, today, May twentieth, is gonna be partly cloudy with no rain, which is uh, pretty nice after all that gloom.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the temperatures are climbing too—like, we're talking plus eight to ten overnight, but then up to twenty-two, twenty-four during the day. Perfect for a walk, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the temperatures are climbing too-like, we're talking plus eight to ten overnight, but then up to twenty-two, twenty-four during the day. Perfect for a walk, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures: +8¦+10ÂC at night, +22¦+24ÂC during the day. After the cold snap, warmth is returning " a perfect time for a walk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, but they do mention the wind's gonna pick up during the day, like nine to fourteen meters per second from the south. Might wanna hold onto your hat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, but they do mention the wind's gonna pick up during the day, like nine to fourteen meters per second from the south. Might wanna hold onto your hat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southerly winds: 3"8 m/s at night, increasing to 9"14 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure. And tomorrow, May 21st, looks similar—partly cloudy again, no precipitation, but that wind's sticking around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure. And tomorrow, May twenty first, looks similar-partly cloudy again, no precipitation, but that wind's sticking around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Temperatures keep rising though—thirteen to fifteen at night, and up to twenty-five in the daytime. Almost summer-like!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temperatures keep rising though-thirteen to fifteen at night, and up to twenty-five in the daytime. Almost summer-like!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then by Wednesday, May 22nd, things might get a bit more interesting—they're saying possible rain and even thunderstorms in the afternoon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then by Wednesday, May twenty second, things might get a bit more interesting-they're saying possible rain and even thunderstorms in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, so maybe don't leave the umbrella at home that day. Still warm though, like twenty-three to twenty-five degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, so maybe don't leave the umbrella at home that day. Still warm though, like twenty-three to twenty-five degrees.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And for Almaty, it's even warmer toward the end of the week—they're forecasting up to thirty, thirty-two degrees by the 22nd!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for Almaty, it's even warmer toward the end of the week-they're forecasting up to thirty, thirty-two degrees by the twenty second!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a real jump. They're warning about overheating and using sun protection, which, you know, makes sense with that kind of heat.
